desc: This course is a continuation of Chemistry 247 topics. Chemistry 248 delves into the chemistry of functional groups, especially those that play a role in the reactivity biomolecules such as carbohydrates, lipids, proteins and nucleic acids. Together Chemistry 247 and 248 provide a full treatment of introductory organic chemistry. Prerequisite: Chemistry 247 or permission of instructor. Offered Spring Semester.
name: Organic Chemistry
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Chemistry 247 or permission of instructor. Offered Spring Semester.
title: Organic Chemistry II
